mapper.insert: insert into job_posts (user_id, title, description, required_skills, salary, location, employment_type, deadline, job_category) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{requiredSkills}, #{salary}, #{location}, #{employmentType}, #{deadline}, #{jobCategory})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY create_at DESC) AS row_num FROM job_posts WHERE user_id = #{userId} ) AS numbered WHERE row_num < 6

select user_id as userId, title, description, required_skills as requiredSkills, salary, location, deadline, create_at as createAt, view_count as viewCount, bookmark_count as bookmarkCount, employment_type as employmentType, job_category as jobCategory from job_posts where id=#{recruitId} and deleted_at is null
